subject: Join us for ROI Boot Camp
body:
Drive Results. Prove Value. ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌
 
 
View in Web Browser
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Are your initiatives delivering the results that matter most? It’s time to stop guessing and start showing real impact. ROI Boot Camp is a one-day, virtual workshop designed to help you build the skills needed to demonstrate the value of your work. 
Here's What You Can Expect
Evaluation Strategies:
 Explore the five levels of evaluation to uncover key insights.
Proven Methodology:
 Understand the ROI Methodology®, aligned with ISO/TS 30347:2023 for measuring impact, validates the value of your initiatives.
Practical Applications: 
Learn to calculate benefit-cost ratio and ROI.
Enroll in ROI Boot Camp for $297 and take the first step towards elevating your impact and ROI!
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
What Others Are Saying
"ROI Boot Camp made the ROI process incredibly easy to understand and apply while helping me build the confidence to measure and communicate impact effectively."
"This workshop delivers invaluable skills at an affordable price—one day of training that pays for itself in measurable results."
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Do you have a colleague that would be interested in this session? Please share this information with them so they, too, can attend. Ask us about training options for your team.
 
 
 
 
 
 
Enroll in ROI Boot Camp

subject: Register Now for Measurement Simplified Workshop
body:
Designed for those new to L&D measurement and for those who want a refresher! ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌
 
 
View in Web Browser
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Unsure what to measure? Don't know where to start? Need a framework to make sense of it all?
Join us for 
Measurement Simplified
 and gain the confidence and skills to measure what matters in learning & development. In just four hours, you'll learn how to select, apply, and report on key measures—without needing any prior experience.
What You Can Expect
Guided by the Talent Development Reporting Principles (TDRp), a proven framework for L&D measurement, this live virtual workshop will show you how to select, apply, and effectively report on measures. 
Facilitated by measurement experts Dave Vance and Peggy Parskey, co-authors of 
Measurement Demystified
, this workshop will help you learn:
How the TDRp framework brings structure and clarity
Essential terminology every L&D professional should know 
Key metrics to track for both individual programs and your entire L&D function
How to calculate and clearly communicate results that resonate with stakeholders
No previous measurement experience required—just bring your curiosity! 
This session is limited to 15 participants, so enroll today to ensure your spot!
 
 
 
 
 
 
Register Now for Measurement Simplified

subject: Demonstrating the Impact and ROI of DEI
body:
Make your DEI efforts count — and prove that they do! ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌
 
 
View in Web Browser
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Demonstrating the Impact and ROI of DEI
April 2, 2025 —1:00 pm CT
Recent data shows a growing trend: 1 in 8 companies are scaling back or eliminating their DEI programs. 
Why? 
49% cite political shifts. 
36% point to a lack of measurable ROI. 
But for the organizations holding firm, the reason is clear — the value of DEI still outweighs the cost
. 
So how can you prove that your DEI investments deliver real business impact?
Join us for a webinar with Patti P. Phillips, Ph.D., CEO, ROI Institute, to learn how to make DEI initiatives work and be able to prove their worth.
 
What You'll Learn
 
 
 
 
 
 
✅  How to create value by investing in DEI
✅  Proven strategies to demonstrate impact and ROI
✅  Actionable steps to align DEI with core business goals
 
 
 
 
 
 
This session is ideal for HR leaders, DEI professionals, and executives who want to drive inclusion and performance — while maintaining executive support.
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Register Now

subject: Can You Credibly Prove Your Project is Worth it?
body:
ROI Institute Can Help ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌
 
 
View in Web Browser
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Important, expensive, and strategic projects often receive a high level of scrutiny. Supporters, sponsors, and top executives all want to know if the project is worth it. 
Is it a good investment? What is the impact? What is the ROI? 
ROI Institute Can Help
Our team of evaluation experts will guide and assist you in proving the value of your work. Whether conducting an evaluation study, implementing a needs assessment, designing data collection instruments, or analyzing data, ROI Institute offers a variety of consulting services. 
We can conduct an independent evaluation of your program.
We can work together with your team to conduct an evaluation.
We can teach you how to conduct an evaluation through ROI Certification®.
By leveraging ROI Institute's expert services, you are investing in a trusted partner committed to helping you achieve the highest possible value from your investments. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Learn More About Our Consulting Services 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
What Others Are Saying
"ROI Institute has been a pivotal partner in advancing the American Diabetes Association's evaluation efforts. Thanks to their innovative methods, we have collected feedback from thousands of learners, identifying gaps in our content and pinpointing opportunities to improve the education we provide. ROI Institute has managed the entire process seamlessly, requiring minimal effort on our part. Their evaluation reports are truly outstanding—comprehensive yet clear, making it easy for all stakeholders to grasp the insights and help us take action."
—Claire Stuve, PhD, MPH, 
Senior Director, Institute of Learning Science and Health Care, 
American Diabetes Association

subject: Learn How to Prove the Value of Your Investments
body:
Join us for ROI Certification in Washington, DC ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌

Join us in Washington, DC — 
July 7-11, 2025
Every program, project, and initiative demands results—but can you prove the impact? The ROI Methodology®, used by more than 9,000 organizations worldwide, is a credible framework for measuring success, justifying investments, and driving real business value. 
Learn How to Prove the Value of Your Investments
We invite you to join us 
for ROI Certification® to learn how to demonstrate impact and ROI by applying this methodology
. During this process, you will build a robust set of measurement and evaluation skills while planning and completing an ROI study guided by ROI Institute experts.
What’s in it for you?
Enhance Your Credibility: 
Become an
 expert in delivering and measuring value.
Optimize Investments:
 
Apply t
he globally recognized ROI Methodology.
Drive Organizational Success: 
I
mprove decision-making and maximize impact.
Whether you work in HR, training, marketing, or other professional fields, ROI Certification is your key to unlocking measurable success. 
Seats are limited—secure yours today!
Not able to travel or prefer to learn at your own pace? Check out our
 
virtual programs
 to find a solution that works for you. Ask us about holding an internal session for your team or how your organization can host a public program. Contact

subject: Join us for ROI Boot Camp
body:
Drive Results. Prove Value. ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌

Are your initiatives delivering the results that matter most? It’s time to stop guessing and start showing real impact. ROI Boot Camp is a one-day, virtual workshop designed to help you build the skills needed to demonstrate the value of your work. 
Here's What You Can Expect
Evaluation Strategies:
 Explore the five levels of evaluation to uncover key insights.
Proven Methodology:
 Understand the ROI Methodology®, aligned with ISO/TS 30347:2023 for measuring impact, validates the value of your initiatives.
Practical Applications: 
Learn to calculate benefit-cost ratio and ROI.
Enroll in ROI Boot Camp for $297 and take the first step towards elevating your impact and ROI!
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
What Others Are Saying
"ROI Boot Camp made the ROI process incredibly easy to understand and apply while helping me build the confidence to measure and communicate impact effectively."
"This workshop delivers invaluable skills at an affordable price—one day of training that pays for itself in measurable results."
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Do you have a colleague that would be interested in this session? Please share this information with them so they, too, can attend. Ask us about training options for your team.
 
 
 
 
 
 
Enroll in ROI Boot Camp

From upskilling and reskilling to innovative approaches to lifelong learning, professional development is essential to ensure organizations stay competitive in this ever-changing business climate. Now is the time to invest in yourself and your team!
Join Us for ROI Certification

balanced approach to 
program evaluation.

, ROI Institute's capstone program for building serious evaluation capability. The ROI Methodology is a valuable tool for all professionals, from program owners and managers to C-Suite executives, to measure the impact and ROI of all types of programs or projects.

Transform your efforts and invest your time and resources into initiatives that deliver the results you want. ROI Boot Camp, a virtual one-day workshop, will equip you with tools and strategies to showcase the impact and ROI of your investments in people, programs, and projects.
Here's What You Can Expect
Evaluation Strategies:
 Learn about the five levels of evaluation and how they can provide valuable insights into the success of your programs.
Proven Methodology:
 Gain a better understanding of how the ROI Methodology®,  the internationally recognized standard for measuring impact and ROI, as highlighted by ISO/TS 30347:2023, measures and validates the value of your initiatives.
Practical Applications:
 Learn how to calculate the benefit-cost ratio and return on investment to showcase the true value of your projects.
Enroll in ROI Boot Camp for $297 and take the first step towards elevating your impact and ROI!

Drive Real Business Results ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌
 
 
View in Web Browser
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Show the Value of What You Do
March 13, 2025 — 2:00 pm CT
Proving and delivering value is more critical than ever. 
If you don’t show the value of your programs or projects, they could receive less funding, be ignored, or even cut. 
Whether you're focused on learning and talent development, innovation, AI integration, people analytics, or cultural transformation, ensuring your initiatives drive measurable impact is key to success.
So, how do you do it?
Join Patti P. Phillips, Ph.D., CEO, ROI Institute, as she shares strategies to help you:
 
 
 
 
 
 
✅ Align investments with organizational priorities
✅ Ensure solutions are practical, actionable, and results-focused
✅ Design strategies that deliver measurable value and impact
 
 
 
 
 
 
Discover how to showcase the true value of your efforts and drive real business results.
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Register Now 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Unsubscribe

2803 Greystone Commercial Blvd, Suite 16 • Birmingham, AL • 35242

subject: The Metric HR Has Been Waiting For.
body:
Stop struggling to connect HR to business success. Discover the Human Success Score.
Hi Kelly,
Imagine this:
 You’re struggling to show how investing in your people translates to business success. Not anymore!
 
What if you could see, in real-time, how engagement, performance, and learning were converging to shape your company’s future results?
 
For too long, we've relied on lagging indicators like retention and eNPS, which fail to convey the urgency and impact of people's performance on business outcomes. That's why we're thrilled to announce the launch of 
Zensai's groundbreaking Human Success Score
.
 
The Human Success Score is a first-of-its-kind metric that provides an in-depth, predictive view, linking team effectiveness to future business performance. And gives you a clear, actionable picture of your organization's health.
 
Learning, engagement, and performance metrics are aggregated to provide a 
real-time pulse
 
on your organization's performance
 and produce a simple, qualified Human Success Score that is:
 
“Simple enough to understand and not overwhelm. 
Focused enough to trigger debate and action. Human enough to matter.”
David Perring, Chief Insights Officer at Fosway Group
 
Discover how Zensai's Human Success Score empowers HR with predictive insights to drive business success. Visit 
zensai.com/the-human-success-score/
 
 
Best regards,
Caroline
 
Zensai International, Mariane Thomsens Gade 4B, Aarhus C, DK 8000, Denmark 
Unsubscribe

subject: Learn How to Prove the Value of Your Investments
body:
Join us for ROI Certification ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌
 
 
View in Web Browser
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Every program, project, and initiative demands results—but can you prove the impact? The ROI Methodology®, used by more than 9,000 organizations worldwide, is a credible framework for measuring success, justifying investments, and driving real business value. 
Learn How to Prove the Value of Your Investments
We invite you to join us 
for ROI Certification® to learn how to demonstrate impact and ROI by applying this methodology
. During this process, you will build a robust set of measurement and evaluation skills while planning and completing an ROI study guided by ROI Institute experts.
What’s in it for you?
Enhance Your Credibility: 
This c
ertification establishes you as an expert in delivering and measuring value, making you an asset to your organization.
Optimize Investments and Prove Value:
 
Learn to measure various outcomes, including the financial ROI, using the internationally recognized ROI Methodology.
Drive Organizational Success: 
Apply what you learn to improve decision-making, maximize impact, and enhance organizational success.
Take the next step and become an ROI expert. Whether you work in HR, training, marketing, or other professional fields, ROI Certification is your key to unlocking measurable success.
Join us In-Person
📍 Washington, DC
📅 May 19-23, 2025
⏳ Seats are limited—secure yours today!
Not able to travel or prefer to learn at your own pace? Check out our 
virtual programs
 to find a solution that works for you. Ask us about holding an internal session for your team or how your organization can host a public program. Contact ROI Institute for additional information.
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Learn More about ROI Certification

Adobe Recognized as a Leader in IDC MarketScape Worldwide Employee Experience for Learning Experience Management
 
 
 
Learning platforms are evolving—and a few are leading the charge. IDC's latest research highlights Adobe Learning Manager as a Leader in delivering intelligent learning experiences due to its 
AI-powered content delivery, extensive enterprise integrations, and robust analytics tied to business outcomes. 
Each vendor was evaluated based on their 
current capabilities
 and 
strategic roadmap
. Adobe Learning Manager’s recognition as a Leader reflects its robust present-day offerings and strategic vision for meeting future learning needs.
Get the complete IDC MarketScape report to understand:
Key trends in AI-powered learning and how they're shaping employee development
How leading platforms are enabling their customers with AI to personalize employee training and close skills gaps in real-time
A detailed comparison of 10 major learning platforms and their approaches to learning experience management
 
 
Download Now

Transform your efforts and invest your time and resources into initiatives that deliver the results you want. ROI Boot Camp, a virtual one-day workshop, will equip you with tools and strategies to showcase the impact and ROI of your investments in people, programs, and projects.
Here's What You Can Expect
Evaluation Strategies:
 Learn about the five levels of evaluation and how they can provide valuable insights into the success of your programs.
Proven Methodology:
 Gain a better understanding of how the ROI Methodology®,  the internationally recognized standard for measuring impact and ROI, as highlighted by ISO/TS 30347:2023, measures and validates the value of your initiatives.
Practical Applications:
 Learn how to calculate the benefit-cost ratio and return on investment to showcase the true value of your projects.
Enroll in ROI Boot Camp for $297 and take the first step towards elevating your impact and ROI!
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
What Others Are Saying
"ROI Boot Camp made the ROI process incredibly easy to understand and apply while helping me build the confidence to measure and communicate impact effectively."
"This workshop delivers invaluable skills at an affordable price—one day of training that pays for itself in measurable results."
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Do you have a colleague that would be interested in this session? Please share this information with them so they, too, can attend. Ask us about training options for your team.
 
 
 
 
 
 
Enroll in ROI Boot Camp

Learn More About the 5 Moments of Need Summit 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
The 5 Moments of Need Summit, May 13-14, 2025, in Charlotte, North Carolina, is a
 must-attend event for anyone looking to enhance job performance through the 5 Moments of Need framework. 
Why Attend?
 
Learn from Industry Experts
: Gain insights from top thought leaders Jack Phillips, Josh Cavalier, Angie Hubert, and Conrad Gottfredson.
Real-World Case Studies
: Be inspired by success stories that demonstrate the tangible impact of the 5 Moments of Need framework.
In-Depth Working Sessions
: Collaborate in hackathons and leave with actionable strategies tailored to your organizational needs.
Showcase of Innovative Tools
: Explore cutting-edge solutions at the Sip+Share.
Be sure to join Jack J. Phillips, Ph.D., chairman, ROI Institute, for his workshop, 
Forecasting Impact and ROI in an Uncertain Economy: A Critical Skill.
Whether you’re new to the 5 Moments of Need and workflow learning, or have been implementing these strategies for some time, there’s something for everyone. Plus, it’s a great chance to network, collaborate, and bring back a wealth of knowledge to your organization.

Want to determine if your program or project was successful? Need to gather feedback but aren’t sure where to begin, what questions to ask, or how to analyze the results?
Let ROI Institute Help You
Our team of experts will measure your program's effectiveness using the ROI Methodology®, the most widely used evaluation system globally. 
Our expertise includes:  
Designing customized surveys by aligning the questions to the needs of your project.
Administering surveys, including levering strategies to support a high response rate.
Analyzing data collected to determine actionable insights. 
Identifying process improvement opportunities.
Reporting results using various communication methods to inform stakeholders. 
Leveraging results to improve support and funding.
Whether you're looking to refine a single program or implement a comprehensive survey strategy, let ROI Institute guide you at every step, from design to results interpretation.
 
 
 
 
 
 
Learn More About Our Consulting Services

subject: Learn How to Prove the Value of Your Investments
body:
Join us for ROI Certification in Washington, DC ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌
 
 
View in Web Browser
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Every program, project, and initiative demands results—but can you prove the impact? The ROI Methodology®, used by more than 9,000 organizations worldwide, is a credible framework for measuring success, justifying investments, and driving real business value. 
Learn How to Prove the Value of Your Investments
We invite you to join us 
for ROI Certification® to learn how to demonstrate impact and ROI by applying this methodology
. During this process, you will build a robust set of measurement and evaluation skills while planning and completing an ROI study guided by ROI Institute experts.
What’s in it for you?
Enhance Your Credibility: 
This c
ertification establishes you as an expert in delivering and measuring value, making you an asset to your organization.
Optimize Investments and Prove Value:
 
Learn to measure various outcomes, including the financial ROI, using the internationally recognized ROI Methodology.
Drive Organizational Success: 
Apply what you learn to improve decision-making, maximize impact, and enhance organizational success.
Take the next step and become an ROI expert. Whether you work in HR, training, marketing, or other professional fields, ROI Certification is your key to unlocking measurable success.
Join us In-Person
📍 Washington, DC
📅 May 19-23, 2025
⏳ Seats are limited—secure yours today!
Not able to travel or prefer to learn at your own pace? Check out our 
virtual programs
 to find a solution that works for you. Ask us about holding an internal session for your team or how your organization can host a public program. Contact ROI Institute for additional information.
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Learn More about ROI Certification

body:
See You In Washington, DC! ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌

Join ROI Institute co-founders Patti P. Phillips, Ph.D., and Jack J. Phillips, Ph.D., and attendees from around the world at the 
ATD25 International Conference & Expo
 
in Washington, DC, May 18-21, 2025. G
ain cutting-edge insights, network with industry leaders, and enhance your talent development strategies in an inspiring global setting.
 
 
Experience engaging keynotes from world-renowned speakers, including athlete and advocate Simone Biles, hands-on workshops, innovative demonstrations, and explore the latest technologies, tools, and trends shaping the future of talent development. The event also offers networking, certification courses, and an extensive expo hall featuring industry-leading solutions.
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Preconference Learning Opportunities
Maximize your learning with these certificate programs taught by ROI Institute experts. 
Evaluating Learning Impact Certificate
 — Taught by Damien Sanchez, Ph.D., senior consultant at ROI Institute, this course helps you gain new skills to assess your learning programs' impact and develop and implement your organization's evaluation strategy.
Measuring Return on Investment Certificate
 
— Taught by Jack J. Phillips, Ph.D., chairman, ROI Institute, this course allows you to develop the skills needed to create and deliver effective return on investment evaluations. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Accelerate Your ROI Certification Journey with ATD Courses
When you enroll in ATD's Evaluating Learning Impact or Measuring Return on Investment (or both), you'll receive exclusive discounts to attend ROI Certification®. Attend both, and you'll be well on your way to earning the renowned Certified ROI Professional® (CRP) designation. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Take Advantage of This Opportunity Now

subject: PlayAI Dialog GA; beats Elevenlabs 3 to 1 in human preference testing
body:
Dear , 
We’re proud to announce that 
PlayAI’s Dialog Text-to-Speech model
 is now in general availability, bringing new multilingual capabilities and beating Elevenlabs in human preference: 
Excellent emotion, pacing, and quality — Outperforms Elevenlabs v2.0 Multilingual in human preference testing 3 to 1
Reduced error rate (now <1%)
Supports 30+ languages
Low latency: 303ms TTFA (Time to First Audio)
Ideal for AI narrations, podcasts, audiobooks and voice agents
Play the video below to find out what it sounds like, or visit our 
AI voiceover Studio
 to try it for yourself. For a limited time, we’re offering discounted 
pricing
 for our higher pay-as-you-go tiers, and for enterprise requirements, we encourage you to 
contact sales
 
 
PlayAI Dialog beats ElevenLabs 
In third party human preference testing via Podonos, Dialog’s fluid, emotionally coherent speech was preferred 10 to 1 compared to Elevenlabs v2.5 Turbo model (similar latency to Dialog). 
For the test against Elevenlabs Multilingual v2.0 (which has much greater latency), we tested 60 male and female voice generations using identical cloned voices and text across a panel of 100 independent evaluators, and 
PlayAI Dialog was preferred 3 to 1
, with respondents highlighting accurate expressiveness and pacing as the reason for their evaluation. 
 
Many thanks to our partners at Podonos, who conducted the independent testing. Additional information and links to the raw test results are available from our blog. 
PlayAI Dialog is now multilingual — 30+ languages available 
In addition to English, Dialog is now multilingual. We’ve added support for Chinese, French, German, Hindi, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese and Urdu. 
An additional 23 languages are experimental: Afrikaans, Arabic, Bengali, Bulgarian, Croatian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Greek, Hebrew, Hungarian, Indonesian, Italian, Malay, Polish, Russian, Serbian, Swedish, Tagalog, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, and Xhosa. 
All these languages are available through our 
API
 and in our 
AI Voiceover Studio
. 
Building accurate, human-sounding voice AI models is not trivial. The benchmarks above show how far we’ve come, but don’t take our word for it, try it on our 
AI Voiceover Studio
 tool, or 
sign back in 
to experiment with our low-latency 
API
 for yourself. 
We have additional details available on our 
blog 
for those interested. We’re also always available for a call - 
contact us
 
 
 
 
 
Visit Play.ai 
© 2024 PlayHT,
535 Alma Street, Palo Alto, CA, 94301

Are you being asked to show the value of your projects, programs, and initiatives? Do you have credible data showing your important programs and projects make a difference?
Attend ROI Certification® and gain expertise to lead and implement ROI-focused initiatives in your organization. In this interactive, hands-on program, you'll learn step-by-step how to apply the ROI Methodology® and develop insightful strategies to drive measurable impact.
What You Can Expect
ROI Certification
 
equips individuals with the skills to make informed decisions, streamline resource allocation, and refine performance improvement strategies. 
By the end of the program, you'll have built a robust set of measurement and evaluation skills while planning an ROI study with guidance from ROI Institute experts. 
Additional benefits include:
In-Depth Learning:
 Content-rich, engaging sessions focused on project evaluation
Resources:
 Detailed workbook, reference books, job aids, tools, and templates 
Virtual Support:
 Receive guidance from ROI experts while completing your project 
Right to Use:
 Materials are provided to build ROI awareness internally
Certified ROI Professional® Designation
: Distinguish yourself as an ROI expert
Digital Badge:
 Showcase your achievement across social media channels and email
ROI Institute Academy:
 Lifetime access to tools, resources, and case studies

subject: Call for speakers - HR, talent, benefits and more
body:
Happy New Year! We’re thrilled to share our 2025 event lineup, featuring 20+ single-day live conferences in cities across the U.S. and 12 virtual events designed to bring together HR / Talent / Benefits executives and decision-makers.
Our invitation-only events will showcase panels, keynotes, breakout workshops, and exclusive networking sessions. Topics will include employee engagement, effective employee benefits, modernizing talent acquisition, fostering inclusive workplaces, skills development, and more.
We’re excited to host distinguished speakers, such as:
SVP and Culture Officer - The Home Depot
Chief Leadership, Culture and Inclusion Officer - IBM
Chief Human Resources Officer - Baker Hughes
Chief Human Resources Officer - Rakuten
Executive Vice President of Human Resources - Gilead
Chief Human Resources Officer - Fortive
Vice President, Talent Engagement and Experience - Comcast
Global SVP, Learning & Organizational Development, HR - Epsilon
Director, Global Benefits - BuzzFeed
We’d love for you to be part of the conversation as a sponsor in 2025! If you're interested in booking a meeting to 
explore speaking sponsorship or exhibitor opportunities or learning more about joining us at one of these events, simply reply to this email and I'd be happy to connect you with someone from our team.
Looking forward to connecting!
Best,
Erin Sauter, CoFounder, From Day One
Confirmed single-day conferences for 2025 include: 
Atlanta – January 28
Washington, D.C. – February 4
Houston – February 11
Salt Lake City – February 25
Silicon Valley – March 6
Seattle – March 25
Dallas – April 16
Minneapolis – May 13
Chicago – June 5
Manhattan – June 10
Austin – September 24
San Francisco – September 30
Philadelphia – October 7
Boston – October 21
Los Angeles – December 3
Half-Day Benefits Conferences: For Benefits Executives Only
Boston - April 2
Manhattan - April 24
Half-Day Talent Acquisition Conferences: For Talent Executives Only
Manhattan - April 23 
 
2025 VIRTUAL CONFERENCES
January 22 - Benefits & Total Rewards
Innovation in Total Rewards: How Creative Leaders Are Finding Affordable Solutions
 
February 19 - Talent Acquisition
Making Talent Acquisition a Strategic Part of Workforce Planning and Growth
 
March 12 - Employee Engagement
Putting Employee Experience at the Center of HR Leadership
 
April 23 - Wellness & Family Benefits
Better Benefits: Supporting the Health and Well-Being of Workers and Their Families
 
May 21 - Employee Recognition
The Role of HR Leaders in Building a Culture of Recognition and Feedback
 
June 11 - Inclusion & Belonging
Charting the Future of Diversity, Equity, Inclusion and Belonging
 
July 16 - Benefits
Navigating the New Landscape of Employee-Benefit Solutions
 
August 13 - Learning, Development, and Skills
Leading the Charge on Skills-Based Learning and Development
 
September 10 - Productivity & Efficiency Tools
Productivity Boosters: How HR Leaders Can Play a Significant Role in Worker Efficiency
 
October 15 - Managing a Global Workforce
Building and Managing a Global Workforce: Smart Strategies for Collaborating Across Borders
 
November 12 - HR Technology
The Empowering Effect of HR Tech: Deciding Where It Will Make a Difference
 
December 10 - Future of Work
What’s Around the Corner: Workers and Workplaces in 2026 and Beyond

Human resources teams are constantly under pressure to prove their value. Executives expect measurable results, making it essential to link HR initiatives to real business outcomes.
Can you credibly connect your HR efforts to tangible business outcomes?
We Can Help
We invite you to attend our live virtual workshop, 
Measuring the Impact and ROI in HR and Learning and Development Programs
. In these insightful and interactive sessions, you will learn how to:
Develop project objectives and collect meaningful data.
Convert outcomes into monetary values and isolate project effects.
Calculate ROI and effectively communicate results to stakeholders.
Internationally renowned ROI expert Jack J. Phillips, Ph.D., cofounder of ROI Institute, will teach you how to use the ROI Methodology®, the world's most widely used evaluation system, and equip you with practical tools to prove the success of your HR and L&D programs.
Through interactive activities, real-world case studies, and actionable strategies, participants will learn to demonstrate value, achieve meaningful outcomes, and drive organizational impact.
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Join the Workshop—Register Now!

Want to determine if your program or project was successful? Need to gather feedback but aren’t sure where to begin, what questions to ask, or how to analyze the results?
Let ROI Institute Help
Our team of experts will measure your program's effectiveness using the ROI Methodology®, the most widely used evaluation system globally. 
Our expertise includes:  
Designing customized surveys by aligning the questions to the needs of your project.
Administering surveys, including levering strategies to support a high response rate.
Analyzing data collected to determine actionable insights. 
Identifying process improvement opportunities.
Reporting results using various communication methods to inform stakeholders. 
Leveraging results to improve support and funding.
How It Works
In collaboration, our team will design a custom survey that aligns with your goals, manage data collection, and provide analysis. With guidance from our award-winning experts, you will receive a final report with insights and actionable recommendations to inform stakeholders. 
Whether you're looking to refine a single program or implement a comprehensive survey strategy, let ROI Institute guide you at every step, from design to results interpretation.
 
 
 
 
 
 
Contact Us to Learn More About Our Survey Services

Are you ready to transform your programs and projects into valuable investments that drive results? It's critical that organizational leaders view your programs as investments, not just activities. The Solution
Designed for learners across all disciplines, ROI Certification® is a comprehensive learning program that takes you step-by-step through the ROI Methodology®. body:

View in Web Browser
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Seeking to collect information to understand if your program or project was a success? Looking to collect feedback but are unsure where to start, what questions to ask, or how to analyze the information gathered? 
Let ROI Institute Help
Our team of experts will measure your program's effectiveness using the ROI Methodology®, the most used evaluation system globally. 
Our expertise includes:  
Designing customized surveys by aligning the questions to the needs of your project.
Administering surveys, including levering strategies to support a high response rate.
Analyzing data collected to determine actionable insights. 
Identifying process improvement opportunities.
Reporting results using various communication methods to inform stakeholders. 
Leveraging results to improve support and funding.
How It Works
In collaboration, our team will design a custom survey that aligns with your goals, manage data collection, and provide analysis. With guidance from our award-winning experts, you will receive a final report with insights and actionable recommendations to inform stakeholders. 
Whether you're looking to refine a single program or implement a comprehensive survey strategy, let ROI Institute guide you at every step, from design to results interpretation.
 
 
 
 
 
 
Contact Us to Learn More About Our Survey Services 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Unsubscribe
 | Sent by ROI Institute 
2803 Greystone Commercial Blvd, Suite 16 • Birmingham, AL • 35242

subject: WEBINAR INVITE: ROI Made Simple
body:
A Step-by-Step Guide to Measuring Success ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌
 
 
View in Web Browser
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
ROI Made Simple: A Step-by-Step Guide to Measuring Success
Are you looking for a proven way to measure the impact of your learning programs and demonstrate their true value?
 
Join us for an exclusive Training Magazine Network webinar with Jack J. Phillips, Ph.D., Chairman of ROI Institute, as he walks you through the renowned ROI Methodology® and explains how this credible process can transform your learning initiatives.
Why Attend?
Don't miss the chance to learn from a leading expert in measurement and evaluation. 
During this free webinar, you'll discover:
A step-by-step process to easily calculate the ROI of your programs.
How to connect learning to business outcomes.
Tips to prove the value of your work to executives and stakeholders.
Ten webinar attendees will win a copy of 
Value for Money: Measuring the Return on Non-Capital Investments
 by Patti and Jack Phillips, which contains 25 ROI case studies.
Whether you're an L&D professional, HR leader, or program manager, this session will provide actionable insights to help you drive measurable results. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Register Today

body:
‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌
 
 
View in Web Browser
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Hi ,
Budget cuts and financial scrutiny are challenging leaders everywhere to prove the value of every dollar spent. Are you ready to rise to the challenge?
In our latest blog, 
Make Every Dollar Count: Protect Your Budget with the ROI Methodology
, we explore practical strategies for safeguarding your budget by showcasing measurable results. Discover how the ROI Methodology® empowers organizations to defend investments and achieve their goals—even in tight financial climates.
Here’s what you’ll read about:
How to align your budget with organizational priorities.
Steps to measure and communicate the true value of your initiatives.
Proven techniques to protect learning, HR, and other operational investments.
Don’t let budget cuts jeopardize your success. Learn how to show the value of what you do!
 
 
 
 
 
 
Read the Full Blog Now 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Unsubscribe
 | Sent by ROI Institute 
2803 Greystone Commercial Blvd, Suite 16 • Birmingham, AL • 35242

subject: 😎 Free template and tutorial video

subject: WEBINAR INVITE: Secrets of High-Performing Organizations: An ROI Approach
body:
Register Today ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌
 
 
View in Web Browser
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Hi ,
Ever wonder what truly sets high-performing organizations apart? Join us for an insightful webinar to learn the strategies that drive success in top-performing organizations.
What You Can Expect
In this session, Jack J. Phillips, Ph.D., chairman, ROI Institute, Inc., will guide you through proven methods to enhance team performance, boost accountability, and measure the ROI of your organization's initiatives. He'll answer these important questions that are key to building and sustaining high-performance teams:
What drives a high-performing organization?
How do you build and lead successful teams?
What factors influence team motivation and success?
How do you evaluate impact and measure ROI?
You'll gain insights into using the ROI Methodology®—the world’s most widely adopted evaluation system—to demonstrate value, align team goals with business objectives, and foster a culture of innovation and improvement.
Who Should Attend?
This session is ideal for leaders, HR professionals, and anyone responsible for driving and measuring performance within their organization.
Don’t miss out on this opportunity to discover proven strategies to drive success. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Register Today 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Unsubscribe
 | Sent by ROI Institute 
2803 Greystone Commercial Blvd, Suite 16 • Birmingham, AL • 35242

subject: MAX 2024 brought power to creators
body:
Read the highlights, view top sessions, and explore the Adobe MAX Creativity Awards honorees.  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ 
December 2024 edition
More power to create what’s true to you.
 
MAX 2024 — a magical event.
Miami Beach was the center of inspiration when tens of thousands of creatives gathered in person and online to ignite their imaginations and explore the latest trends and tools. Discover the highlights of this celebration of creativity.
Learn more
 
Mark your calendar for MAX 2025 and save $600.
Make plans to join us for MAX 2025, October 26–28 in Los Angeles. Sign up to be notified when registration opens and you’ll save US$600 on the regular price of a full conference pass. There’s no financial obligation, just a chance to lock in your savings.
Sign up and save
 
Catch the top sessions.
From the latest innovations in Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator to generative AI and more, these are some of the most popular sessions from MAX Miami Beach.
New and Incredible Innovations in Photoshop
Work Happy, Not Harder with Generative AI in Photoshop
See One, Do One, Teach One: Techniques for Mastering Illustrator
Ideas to Images: A Creative Journey
Creativity Super Session: Video and AI
 
View a curated playlist.
MAX playlists make it easy for you to find all the sessions for the topics you’re most interested in. Make an investment in your career and set aside some time to watch and learn.
Social Media and Marketing
Graphic Design and Illustration
Video, Audio, and Motion
Photography
3D
 
Meet the Adobe MAX Creativity Awards honorees.
Celebrating excellence in creativity and innovation, Adobe announced the honorees in these six categories: Digital Design, Experimental, Use of Color, Animation, Mixed Media, and Storytelling.
Explore the honorees
 
Stay connected and inspired.
Follow us on 
Facebook
 and 
X
 for the latest updates, creative tips, and inspiration. We can’t wait to see you at MAX 2025.
Become a sponsor for Adobe MAX 2025.
Connect with the MAX community as an event sponsor.
See how
 
 
 
 
 
Adobe services, like Adobe Creative Cloud, are available only to users 13 and older. Use of Adobe services and applications requires agreement with the applicable 
Terms of Use
 and the 
Adobe Privacy Policy
.

.

subject: WordPress has a problem
body:
Learn about potential problems affecting WordPress
 
WordPress has a problem
The WordPress community is facing some controversy, which could affect your business. To navigate these risks without the drama, let’s talk about 3 alternative platforms to power your modern website.

subject: HR’s Digital Future - Virtual Conference 12/11
body:
kelly 
- This is Erin, co-founder of From Day One. I wanted to personally invite you to our upcoming virtual conference on December 11th, where Matthew Loys Duncan, Head of Future of Work Thought Leadership at Microsoft, will be leading a discussion on digital transformation alongside other HR executives.
With the event just around the corner, I’d love for you to join us for 
Pioneering Approaches to Digital Transformation and the Future of Work
. This half-day session offers valuable insights and learning opportunities with fellow HR professionals. You can attend from wherever you’re working, and earn 3 SHRM/HRCI recertification credits!
As technology – especially AI – continues to shape the workplace, it’s easy to feel overwhelmed, but it also presents incredible potential for the future of your workforce. During the conference, we’ll dive into how integrating advanced tech into HR can drive innovation in talent acquisition, boost employee engagement, enhance strategic planning, and support departmental growth. We’ll also discuss how AI tools can refine workforce analytics, optimize development plans, track KPIs, and identify areas for improvement.
Feel free to 
register with this link
, or reply to this email and we’ll get you signed up. Below my signature, you’ll find more details on our confirmed speakers and session themes for a sneak peek at what's to come.
Looking forward to having you join us!
Regards, 
Erin Sauter 
Co-founder, CRO
From Day One
Announced speakers include: 
Matthew Loys Duncan, Head of Future of Work Thought Leadership, Microsoft
Sonya Echols, VP, HR, for Technical Operations, Network, Engineering and Construction, Comcast
Jamil Zaki, Professor of Psychology and Director of the Stanford Social Neuroscience Lab / Stanford University
Maris Krieger, Senior Director, Talent Programs / Hearst Corporation
Nicole Smith, Editorial Audience Director / Harvard Business Review
Lydia Dishman, Senior Editor, Growth and Engagement / Fast Company 
Emily McCrary-Ruiz-Esparza, Journalist / From Day One, Contributing Editor
Megan Ulu-Lani Boyanton, Reporter / The Denver Post
Themes: 
Adapting to Evolving Workforce Expectations: Key Areas for Leaders' Focus in the New Year
As the workforce landscape continues to evolve, leaders must pay attention to key areas such as transforming technology, new skills, learning and development, and more. How can leaders navigate technology transformation challenges in an evolving workforce? What innovative strategies can leaders implement to enhance talent acquisition, considering emerging trends and technologies in the job market? What trends and focal points should leaders look out for in 2025?
How Far Should AI Go? Exploring the Workforce Limits of Generative AI
Generative AI has altered work dynamics, bringing both benefits and challenges. But in order to be beneficial and ethical, it requires defined limitations. Where should companies set boundaries for its use? How can they ensure clear communication of these limits to prevent overstepping? How are organizations maintaining a balance between human involvement and tasks now handled by technology?
How Equitable Technology Can Boost Diversity
Employment-recruiting algorithms often have built-in racial and other biases, but it doesn't have to be that way. In fact, they can be easier to fix than some of the other systemic biases in the labor market. What are some of the most innovative technologies and tools to help promote diversity? How can equitable AI help employers achieve their diversity and inclusion commitments? With the arrival of new technologies, what is the role of human judgment in the hiring process?
If you wish to unsubscribe from our newsletter, click 
here

Seeking to collect information to understand if your program or project was a success? Looking to collect feedback but are unsure where to start, what questions to ask, or how to analyze the information gathered? 
Let ROI Institute Help
Our team of experts will measure your program's effectiveness at multiple levels, including reaction, learning, application, and impact, using the ROI Methodology®, the most used evaluation system globally. 
Our expertise includes:  
Designing customized surveys by aligning the questions to the needs of your project.
Developing questions for reaction, learning enhancements, application, and impact.
Administering surveys, including levering strategies to support a high response rate.
Analyzing data collected to determine actionable insights. 
Identifying process improvement opportunities.
Reporting results using various communication methods to inform stakeholders. 
Leveraging results to improve support and funding.
How It Works
In collaboration, our team will design a custom survey that aligns with your goals, manage data collection, and provide analysis. With guidance from our award-winning experts, you will receive a final report with insights and actionable recommendations to inform stakeholders. 
Whether you're looking to refine a single program or implement a comprehensive survey strategy, let ROI Institute guide you at every step, from design to results interpretation.

What’s the ROI in AI?
Artificial Intelligence (AI) is revolutionizing the way we work, learn, communicate, and connect. The question is, how can users ensure they are maximizing AI’s value? 
In this webinar, Jack J. Phillips, Ph.D., chairman of ROI Institute, Inc., will explain how to measure the return on investment in AI initiatives and emphasize why designing an AI strategy with measurable outcomes is essential for long-term success. Using the ROI Methodology®, participants will learn how to assess the financial and non-financial impact of utilizing AI, enabling them to make informed decisions that drive performance, innovation, and results.
Why Attend?
Attend this webinar to discover proven methods for measuring and showcasing the impact of investments in AI, empowering you to drive meaningful results in your organization. 
Each webinar participant will receive an e-copy of our book, 
The Value of Innovation
.
 
 
 
 
 
 
Register Today

subject: Introducing PlayDialog beta – the first multi-turn voice AI model built for conversation
body:
Dear ,
We are proud to announce the launch of PlayDialog beta, our most ambitious and powerful end-to-end AI speech model. PlayDialog is the industry’s first voice AI model built for multi-turn conversations that delivers more natural, human sounding speech. Try it on our 
playground
. 
 
 
We’re also releasing PlayNote, a tool that lets users create podcasts, briefings, narrations, and even childrens’ stories from files like PDFs, text, videos, and other media. 
PlayDialog is the industry’s first multi-turn voice model 
PlayDialog beta was trained on 100s of millions of conversations that represent real-world examples, and closely matches human speech on prosody (intonation, pacing of speech). 
PlayDialog uses a novel architecture that we call an “Adaptive Speech Contextualizer” (ASC) that allows the model to use the full context and history of a conversation, meaning that every response sounds natural, because it is enriched with appropriate prosody, tone, and emotion that reflect the flow of the conversation, whether it’s one or two speakers. 
In blind testing, PlayDialog beta outperformed the leading competitive models in the market by 2:1 (n=600), with expressiveness scoring highest as a factor for the preference. PlayDialog beta is available in our 
Studio
 and our 
Playground
, and will be available through API soon - try it for yourself! 
 
Build narrations, briefings and podcasts in our PlayNote tool 
Along with PlayDialog beta, we are launching 
PlayNote
, a narration and podcast creation tool that lets anyone create powerful, natural sounding narrations, podcasts, briefings and more in just minutes from multiple media types, like text files, spreadsheets, and images. It’s similar to NotebookLM, but with the advantage of using a selection of PlayDialog voices that sound far more natural. 
We look forward to seeing what you build with us! If you’ve custom, high volume requirements, feel free to 
contact our sales team
. 
 
 
 
 
Visit Play.ai 
© 2024 PlayHT,
535 Alma Street, Palo Alto, CA, 94301 
Unsubscribe

subject: Unlock the Power of HR Tech - Virtual Event 11/20
body:
kelly
 – It’s Erin again, co-founder of From Day One. With our virtual conference quickly approaching on the 20th, I wanted to make sure you received this personal invite from me. Our live events have received outstanding feedback from leaders on our topics of HR tech in driving workplace transformation. We’ve tailored this virtual conference to make it accessible to all HR leaders looking to elevate their workforce strategies. 
 
The rise of tech in workspaces can be daunting, but it’s an effective path towards achieving your company’s small and large-scale goals. We’ll be diving deep into how integrating cutting-edge tech into HR can optimize talent acquisition, support employee engagement, streamline future planning, and deliver measurable growth across departments. By leveraging all that AI-driven tools have to offer you can improve workforce analytics, build a data-driven development plan, drive KPIs, and assess gaps in your business. 
I hope you can join us for 
Finding and Deploying HR Tech That Will Empower Workers
 on November 20th for a half-day of learning with your HR peers. You can log on from anywhere you take meetings and earn 3 credits through SHRM/HRCI.  
Below my signature I have included a list of confirmed speakers and session themes so you can get a preview of the key topics we’ll cover. 
Register here with this link
. 
Best, 
Erin Sauter
Co-founder, CRO
From Day One
November Virtual Conference
Wednesday, November 20, 2024
12 - 4:30 pm ET
3 credits SHRM/HRCI
Announced speakers include: 
Sonya Echols, VP, HR, for Technical Operations / Comcast 
Veronika Lantseva, Head of Employee Engagement / U.S. Bank 
Ankit Saxena, Global Head of People Insights and HR Technology / PPG Industries
Miriam Brilleman, Senior Director, People Partnering / Cushman & Wakefield
Lesli Stasiek, Senior Director, HR / Cencora
Lydia Dishman, Senior Editor, Growth and Engagement / Fast Company 
Themes: 
Empowering Your Team: Staying Current With the Latest Tech Trends
The introduction of AI and other emerging technologies can be essential, yet employers are finding that employees worry about getting left behind. How can employers promote workplace equity in the course of digital transformation, so that workers are provided with the technology and training they need to succeed? What are the elements of a culture of feedback and productive learning for both workers and managers? 
How Innovative Companies Put Advanced HR Technology to Work
Employers have discovered the power of new generations of HR technology, including generative AI, cloud systems, sophisticated mobile apps, and more. Yet putting these technologies to work calls for a thoughtful process: identifying the needs, choosing the technology, persuading employees to embrace unfamiliar systems, and other steps. What are the best practices for implementing cutting-edge technology, and what are the lessons learned along the way?
Using AI to Revolutionize Hiring for Top Talent, While Avoiding the Pitfalls
For talent acquisition, AI presents a remarkable tool that can help by verifying candidates’ backgrounds and skills, suggesting interview questions, creating candidate profiles, and other tasks. As tech hiring picks up, especially for AI roles, how can TA leaders make the best use of the new technology, while also being on the alert for candidates using AI fraudulently during skills assessments? How can TA specialists use AI to solve many of their pain points, while continuing to focus on the aspects of the job that require the human touch?
You received this email from From Day One. If you would like to unsubscribe, 
click here
.

subject: Absorb LMS 2024-2025 Roadmap Update
body:
Good morning Kelly,
 
It's been a while, but I hope this message finds you well! As someone who has been a valued part of our network, I wanted to share our exciting plans for the future of the Absorb LMS with you.
 
Our team has been hard at work planning and implementing upgrades to the LMS, and with that comes an updated, comprehensive product roadmap. You can read all about it here:  
2024-25 Product Roadmap
 
Roadmap plans focus on the following themes:
Future-Proofing the Foundation of our Solution
Advanced Personalized Experiences
Upskilling Opportunities
Expanding Social and External Learning Opportunities
Ensuring the LMS Continues to be a Scalable Solution
 
We value your feedback and are eager to hear your thoughts on these upcoming enhancements. If you have any questions, or updates on the status of your need for an LMS, we’d love to hear from you!
 
Thank you for taking the time to read this. I hope we have the opportunity to reconnect soon.
 
Best Regards,
 
 
Brad Koster

subject: Zensai News: Celebrate Our G2 Fall Leader Status and more!
body:
Celebrate our G2 Fall Leader status and explore AI-powered learning solutions from Microsoft Ignite 2024. Discover strategies for enhancing employee engagement and effective workforce planning, plus don't miss our upcoming webinars!
 
Hi Kelly,
 
Welcome to our October Newsletter! 
 
In this edition, we celebrate Zensai's recognition as a G2 Fall Leader and explore how our platform empowers HR professionals with cutting-edge solutions. Discover how AI can enhance employee experiences, learn the essentials of strategic workforce planning, and see how Nelson Mullins revamped their onboarding process. Plus, don't miss our upcoming webinars and details about Microsoft Ignite 2024.
 
Dive in to explore these exciting topics and more!
 
Zensai is a G2 Leader, securing 75 badges this Fall
 
Proudly celebrating a new milestone, Zensai has claimed the G2 Fall Leader title with an impressive 75 badges across nine categories! As a powerhouse in 
Learning & Performance Management and Employee Engagement
, Zensai’s Human Success Platform is designed to inspire growth, simplify workflows, and elevate employee potential. Discover why companies worldwide trust Zensai to drive innovation and success.
READ MORE HERE
 
Discover more exciting Zensai News
 
How to Use AI in HR: 5 Use Cases For Happier Employees
 
Discover how AI can transform HR processes and foster a happier workforce! This article dives into five powerful use cases for AI in HR, from personalized onboarding to predictive analytics for employee engagement. Learn how leveraging AI with Zensai can elevate the employee experience and bring new efficiencies to your HR team.
READ MORE
 
 
What is Workforce Planning and Why It Is the Secret to Better Business
 
Unlock the secret to proactive business growth through strategic workforce planning. This article explains what workforce planning entails and why it's essential for companies aiming for long-term success. Explore actionable insights to help you align workforce needs with business goals and build a more resilient, future-ready team.
READ MORE
 
Nelson Mullins finds an effective employee onboarding solution in Learn365
 
See how Nelson Mullins transformed their onboarding with Zensai’s Learn365 solution! Discover how this innovative legal firm streamlined employee integration and increased engagement through tailored, efficient onboarding. Learn why they chose Zensai to simplify processes and empower new hires for success from day one.
READ FULL SUCCESS STORY
 
Visit Zensai at Microsoft Ignite in Chicago
 
Join us at Microsoft Ignite 2024! Explore the latest innovations in cloud technology, AI, and digital transformation alongside industry leaders. Visit Zensai’s booth to discover how our Human Success Platform aligns with the newest Microsoft advancements, transforming how companies support and empower their teams. Don’t miss the chance to connect and learn more about the future of workplace technology!
EXPLORE MORE HERE
 
Can't make it to Microsoft Ignite in Chicago?
 
Don’t worry—you can still connect with Zensai’s experts and get the latest industry insights from anywhere! Our upcoming webinars will dive into innovations in HR, employee engagement, and digital transformation. Join us online to explore best practices and discover solutions to empower your teams. 
Check out the full lineup here
!
Contact Us
 
We’d love to hear from you! If you have any questions, feedback, or need assistance, please feel free to reach out to us.
CONTACT US
 
Stay connected with us on LinkedIn
 for the latest updates and news!
Like what you read? Feel free to share our newsletter with your colleagues. They can also sign up to receive our latest news by clicking 
here
.
 
Best wishes
The Zensai Team
Succeed like you
.
Copyright © 2024 Zensai International All Rights Reserved.
 Mariane Thomsens Gade 4B, , DK-8000 Aarhus C, Denmark

ISO Standard for L&D Metrics Workshop: A Live Virtual Event
October 30, 2024 — 10:00 am to 2:00 pm CT
ISO standards are internationally recognized guidelines created by the International Organization for Standardization (ISO) to ensure quality, safety, efficiency, and consistency across industries worldwide. 
By mastering the ISO Standard for L&D Metrics, you will position yourself as a leader in the field, staying ahead of industry trends and best practices. 
Our ISO Standard for L&D Metrics Workshop will equip you with the latest tools, strategies, and insights to drive exceptional results in your organization.
Why Should You Attend?
Explore L&D Metrics:
 Identify 
the recommended metrics and calculation methods, including the P
hillips ROI Methodology®, 
the internationally recognized standard for measuring impact and return on investment, as highlighted by ISO/TS 30347:2023.
Drive Performance:
 Gain actionable insights into how L&D metrics can improve performance. Discover key performance indicators that align with organizational goals and empower you to make data-driven decisions.
Network and Collaborate:
 Connect with industry peers, share experiences, and collaborate on innovative approaches to L&D measurement. Our interactive sessions foster meaningful discussions and networking opportunities that enrich your learning journey.
The workshop is limited to 20 participants, so register today to ensure you have the opportunity to attend this live virtual event.

subject: Meet Play 3.0 mini: Faster, Smarter, Multilingual Speech AI
body:
Dear ,
We are delighted to introduce our latest Text-To-Speech model, Play 3.0 mini. It’s faster, more accurate, handles multiple languages, supports streaming from LLMs, and it’s more cost-efficient than ever before. We’ve listened to your feedback to make this a reliable and accurate voice model with several new capabilities - watch the video in the blog article below for a few examples: 
 
Play 3.0 mini is our fastest multilingual speech model yet 
Play 3.0 mini achieves mean latency of 189 milliseconds to TTFB, making it one of the industry’s fastest AI TTS models. It supports text-in streaming from LLMs, and audio-out streaming, and can be used with our REST API, websockets API, or SDKs. It’s also 28% faster at inference than Play 2.0. 
Play 3.0 mini is more accurate with alphanumeric sequences 
Play 3.0 mini’s voice LLM has been trained with more diverse datasets, including complex alphanumeric sequences to increase reliability for critical use cases requiring accurate pronunciation, emphasis, and pacing of information such as phone numbers, credit cards numbers, currencies, etc. Our new model has achieved a 40% reduction in character error rate over previous models. Below are a few examples of challenging generations that Play 3.0 mini now handles: 
 
Play 3.0 mini has industry-leading voice similarity for voice cloning 
When cloning voices, close often isn’t good enough. Play 3.0 voice cloning is state-of-the-art. We cloned a set of voices using our and competitor models, ran the cloned and original voices through a popular voice embedding model, and scored considerably higher for similarity. If you need to clone a voice accurately, we’re the logical choice. Try it for yourself by cloning your own voice, and talking to yourself on 
https://play.ai 
 
Play 3.0 mini supports multiple languages 
Play 3.0 mini now supports more than 30 languages, many with multiple male and female voice options out of the box. English, Japanese, Hindi, Arabic, Spanish, Italian, German, French, and Portuguese voices are available now for production use cases through our 
API
. Additionally, Afrikaans, Bulgarian, Croatian, Czech, Hebrew, Hungarian, Indonesian, Malay, Mandarin, Polish, Serbian, Swedish, Tagalog, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Urdu, and Xhosa are available for testing. 
 
Play 3.0 supports Websockets 
Play 3.0’s API now supports websockets, which significantly reduces the overhead of opening and closing HTTP connections, and makes it easier than ever to enable text-in streaming from LLMs or other sources. 
Play 3.0 is more cost efficient 
We’re happy to announce reduced unit pricing for our higher volume Startup and Growth tiers, and have now introduced a new Pro tier at $49 a month for businesses with more modest requirements. Check out our new pricing table 
here
. 
You can read the full blog 
here
, and check out the examples of voices, languages, and how we handle challenging numeric sequences. For additional information, please check out our 
migration guide
 or try out our 
playground
. 
We’re excited with this release, and look forward to seeing what you’ll build! 
 
 
 
 
Visit Play.ai 
© 2024 PlayHT,
535 Alma Street, Palo Alto, CA, 94301 
Unsubscribe

Becoming a Certified ROI Professional® is more than just earning a credential—it's about gaining the skills, tools, and experience to show the value of what you do. Today's decision-makers need clear evidence of impact to justify investments and drive organizational growth. 
Attend "How to Become ROI Certified" on October 17, 2024, with Patti P. Phillips, Ph.D., CEO, ROI Institute, Inc., to learn how becoming a Certified ROI Professional® (CRP) will help you quantify success, boost efficiency, and lead with impact.
As a Certified ROI Professional, you'll be equipped to:
Accurately measure the return on investment (ROI) of your initiatives
Present data-backed insights that lead to better decision-making
Build credibility by aligning your projects with organizational goals
Demonstrate your value, improve outcomes, and drive change
Don't miss this opportunity to learn why ROI is a great skill set to have in competitive times and how having CRPs on the team is an essential asset to any organization.
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Register Now

subject: RE: Availability to meet to discuss eLearning renewal
body:
Hi Kelly,
I hope you are well.
For some reason our links have expired on the purchases below that we made over a year ago.
Can you please send me new links for us to be able to provide these trainings to our staff?
 
We would like people to finish them by the end of this year, so please send as soon as you can if possible.
 
Thank You,
 
 
Sarah Shafton 
San Francisco Zoo and Gardens
People, Culture, and Belonging Director
Email: sarahs@sfzoo.org
Phone: (415)753-7129
Cell: (415) 859-6054
Pronouns: (she/her)
 
The mission of the San Francisco Zoo and Gardens is to 
CONNECT
 people with wildlife, inspire 
CARING
 for nature and advance 
CONSERVATION 
action. 
 
 
 
 
From:
 Kelly Salek <k.salek@lcwmail.com> 
Sent:
 Thursday, July 27, 2023 3:49 PM
To:
 Vitus Leung <vitusl@sfzoo.org>; Sarah Shafton <sarahs@sfzoo.org>; Brenda Olivera <brendao@sfzoo.org>
Cc:
 Vince Bongiovanni <v.bongiovanni@lcwmail.com>
Subject:
 FW: Availability to meet to discuss eLearning renewal
Importance:
 High
 
Good day Vitus – 
Vince shared that you are in need of the IMUB course link for a colleague…no problem at all. In fact, I have shared all three of your courses below (yellow highlight is the one you requested). Please let me know if you need anything else. 
 
Creating an Inclusive Environment: Practicing Inclusion
 
https://app.cloud.scorm.com/sc/InvitationConfirmEmail?publicInvitationId=e8c0d2fc-5f13-46c5-b0cd-bded260a80bb
 
Fostering Collaboration
https://app.cloud.scorm.com/sc/InvitationConfirmEmail?publicInvitationId=ecc09de0-12ff-4149-a022-ed022b9762b1
 
Introduction to Managing Unconscious Bias
https://app.cloud.scorm.com/sc/InvitationConfirmEmail?publicInvitationId=291f324a-4f0e-4970-903c-3982ea815277
 
 
Best!!!
 
KELLY SALEK 
(she/her)

Direct: +1.630.234.7807

Hi Vince,
 
We haven’t spoken for a long time.  Hope you are well.  I have an employee who has been recommended to take the Unconscious Bias training module. We have an active account with LCW but don’t have access to that training.   We need this employee to take the training by no later than Monday, July 31
st
.  Can you help us with this request?  If not, can you direct us to the appropriate personnel?  Thank you. Vitus

subject: Transform How Your Organization Views its Investments in People, Programs, and Projects
body:
‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌
 
 
View in Web Browser
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Are you ready to transform how your organization views its investments in people, programs, and projects? It's time to shift the perception from mere activities, which represent costs and are often the first to be cut, to strategic investments that drive meaningful results and gain leaders' support.
 
The Solution
 
ROI Certification®
 
is a comprehensive learning program designed to elevate your measurement and evaluation capabilities. Ideal
 for professionals across all disciplines, ROI Certification offers  numerous benefits for anyone tasked with showing the value of their initiatives.
 
Why Attend ROI Certification?
Proven Methodology:
 Gain expertise in the globally recognized ROI Methodology®.
Practical Application:
 Learn by doing, ensuring your learning is relevant and impactful.
Expert Guidance:
 Receive support and coaching from ROI Institute experts.
Tangible Results:
 
Equip yourself with the tools and skills to deliver data-driven results.
Global Network:
 Connect with others worldwide who have completed the program.
Career Advancement:
 Enhance your skill set and open doors to new opportunities.
Attending ROI Certification enhances your evaluation capabilities and drives value for your organization, positioning you as a leader in demonstrating the impact of strategic investments.
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Learn More About ROI Certification 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Unsubscribe
 | Sent by ROI Institute 
2803 Greystone Commercial Blvd, Suite 16 • Birmingham, AL • 35242

2024 LearnOps® Summit
September 25, 2024 — 
12:00 to 5:00 pm ET
Are you ready to transform your corporate learning and development strategies?
In partnership with Cognota, we invite you to the 2024 LearnOps® Summit, a free virtual event that promises to revolutionize your approach to corporate learning. This event will provide you with exclusive insights from top L&D leaders, including Patti P. Phillips, Ph.D., CEO, ROI Institute, who are driving innovation and shaping the future of learning and development.
What's in it for you?
Discover the power of LearnOps to streamline and optimize your learning operations.
Learn from L&D experts who are at the forefront of industry trends and innovations.
Gain actionable strategies to elevate and evaluate your organization's L&D programs.
Whether you're a seasoned professional or just starting your journey in corporate learning, d
on't miss this opportunity to learn, connect, and grow – all from the comfort of your home or office.
 
 
 
 
 
 
Learn More About the 2024 LearnOps Summit

subject: Address Your Talent Shortage with Upskilling
body:
‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌
 
 
View in Web Browser
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Ongoing worker shortages remain a pain point for organizations across industries, making it clear that upskilling isn't just a nice-to-have—it's a business imperative. A recent 
Human Resource Executive
 article stressed the urgency of investing in skill development as key to solving this gap. 
The question is—how can you ensure your upskilling efforts deliver results? 
Building the capability to measure and evaluate their impact through ROI Certification® will empower you to connect your investments in upskilling with tangible business outcomes.
Through this credible process, you'll learn how to:
✅ Demonstrate the value of your programs, projects, and initiatives. 
✅ Make data-driven decisions on your investments.
✅ Drive meaningful results that impact your organization's bottom line.
Upskilling your team is essential, but measuring its effectiveness is the real game-changer. Learn how you can lead this transformation—join us for ROI Certification!
 
 
 
 
 
 
Learn More About ROI Certification

2803 Greystone Commercial Blvd, Suite 16 • Birmingham, AL • 35242
