subject: Action recommended: Ensure your resources that interact with Azure services are using TLS 1.2 by 31 October 2024
body:
Support for TLS 1.0 and TLS 1.1 will end. 
 
If you have resources that interact with Azure services and still use TLS 1.1 or earlier, transition them to TLS 1.2 or later by 31 October 2024
You're receiving this email because you're an Azure customer. 
To enhance security and provide best-in-class encryption for your data, 
we'll require interactions with Azure services to be secured using Transport Layer Security (TLS) 1.2 or later beginning 31 October 2024
, when support for TLS 1.0 and 1.1 will end. 
The Microsoft implementation of older TLS versions is not known to be vulnerable, however, TLS 1.2 and later offer improved security with features such as perfect forward secrecy and stronger cipher suites. 
Recommended action 
To avoid potential service disruptions, 
confirm that
 
your resources that interact with Azure services are using TLS 1.2 or later
. Then: 
If they're already exclusively using TLS 1.2 or later, you don't need to take further action. 
If they still have a dependency on TLS 1.0 or 1.1, 
transition
 
them to TLS 1.2 or later by 31 October 2024
. 
Help and support 
Read more about the 
update to TLS 1.2
. If you have questions, get answers from community experts in 
Microsoft Q&A
. If you have a support plan and you need technical help, please create a 
support request
. 
 
 
 
 
This message from Microsoft is an important part of a program, service, or product that you or your company purchased or participates in. Microsoft respects your privacy. Please read our 
Privacy Statement
. 
This is a mandatory service communication. To set your contact preferences for other communications, visit the 
Promotional Communications Manager
. 
Microsoft Corporation, 
One Microsoft Way, Redmond, WA 98052

subject: We Value Your Input: Is Your Workforce Ready to Leverage AI?
body:
Your feedback is incredibly important! ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌
 
 
View in Web Browser
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Dear ,
We invite you to participate in a brief survey conducted by the Institute for Corporate Productivity (i4cp) to help researchers understand how companies like yours are preparing their workforce for AI's transformative technology. Your responses will provide critical data that can help shape the future of workforce development.
Upon completion, you'll receive real-time results and a comprehensive analysis once the survey closes. Please share this survey with your network to ensure a wide range of insights.
Your feedback is incredibly important, so we thank you in advance for your time and input!
 
 
 
 
 
 
Take the Survey 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Unsubscribe
 | Sent by ROI Institute 
2803 Greystone Commercial Blvd, Suite 16 • Birmingham, AL • 35242

subject: 😎 Download Data Protection course for free
body:
Yes, that is right, download a ready-made course with source files for free
 
 
Hey, Kelly,
A bit personal note from me:
About a week ago, my phone stopped working, it might have to do something with the fact that I had just gone swimming and being the lazy bastard I am, I put my phone in the wet swimming shorts. But this time it was a bit weird as it seemed it is blocked as iPhone kept tellin me to try again in 15 min. So for a while I thought shit, I am hacked, immediately I understood the vulnerability I have with my phone, as you know FasterCourse has lots of digital services, almost all of them use some kind of 2 factor authentication, usually by sending some code to your phone, so it added a bit to the anxiety. I felt a bit like a child who is lost. Morale of the story, don't put your phone in wet swimming shorts, and also data protection is important if you want to avoid being locked out of your phone or email and the importance of it you understand only when you are in trouble. We get these weird scam emails and even phone calls all the time, and you somehow learn to deal with it. With emails, my personal recipe to spot scammers is to check the senders email address, if your bank sends you emails from yahoo email address, you don't have to look any further, mark spam and off you go to reading twitter or sipping a cup of tea. This solves about 80% of issues. But there is more, and to be honest 
FasterCourse 
even has a course on data protection, and up till now we were selling it :), but today we made it free download. Because frankly it is good and we want people to see it, and raise awareness that we produce good stuff. The other reason as important is that for a few months now, I have been looking for motivation and inspiration regarding FasterCourse, after 17 years of building templates and courses for companies worldwide, having NASA as your client etc, what else? And at least for now, one thing that still motivates me came from one comment from a friend, that said that 
FasterCourse 
with its templates has left a small and humble but still an impact on the industry. So we want to keep doing it.
Sorry for the long intro, download Data Protection course for free and use it.
Demo: 
https://demo.fastercourse.com/courses/Data_Protection_Storyline/story_html5.html
Download:
https://fastercourse.com/course-templates/data-protection-course/
 
Best Regards,
Karlis Sprogis
CEO and Founder
FasterCourse
https://fastercourse.com/
Are you on Linkedin? Let's connect:
https://www.linkedin.com/in/karlissprogis/

subject: 🤩 27 courses available now for $99 a piece
body:
Check it out.
 
 
Hi, Kelly,
You asked for it, and we delivered. Now you can purchase any of our 27 courses individually, no need to purchase all of them in a bundle. You can still do that too btw. 
As you know FasterCourse offers ready made courses with source files for Adobe Captivate and Articulate Storyline, these courses cover topics like Sales Skills, AML, Data Protection, Leadership and others. They can be used out of the box, or adjusted to your needs, as you get them with source files. They can save you lots of time, as the instructional design is done, and let's be honest 80% of Business Ethics courses around the world have a lot of things in common. Why invent the wheel each time? But of course some things are specific and then you add your magic and make these courses truly yours. 
So where is the catch, there is none, we decided we really want to spread our products and make them more available, and hopefully provide our humble contribution to our beloved industry. 
So now each course costs just $99. One time payment. Use forever. Enjoy. 
Example screenshot of a diversity course, btw graphic files are included in the source files as well. Too good to be true I know. 
You can see all 27 courses that are available here:
https://fastercourse.com/course-templates/
Have a fantastic weekend! 
Best Regards,
Karlis Sprogis
CEO and Founder
FasterCourse
https://fastercourse.com/
Are you on Linkedin? Let's connect:
https://www.linkedin.com/in/karlissprogis/

subject: Absorb LMS - Important Feature Updates (Q3)
body:
Hi Kelly,
 
I hope all is well and you're having a great week so far! It's been a little while since we last connected, so I wanted to let you know about the new features Absorb is releasing this quarter. Below are some highlights:
 
Custom Course Ribbons: 
Drive engagement with more intentionally curated content by easily highlighting courses on selected topics based on the course category or tags.
Mobile Course Categories:
 Enhanced course navigation and search with improved course discoverability within the mobile app.  Navigate complex catalogs with greater ease.
Accessibility Enhancements:
 Significant accessibility improvements for Learner, Manager and Reviewer experience.
Create AI Custom Themes:
 Enable customers to design slide templates that can be seamlessly used with Create AI in course generation.
Bulk Course Edit:
 Streamline administration of courses with bulk course editing.
Core Reporting Enhancements: 
By leveraging client feedback from the Ideas Portal, we identified quick wins that will bolster reporting capabilities in the Admin Experience.
 
For the full story, please see our release notes page here: 
Release Notes - Absorb Help Center
 
If you have interest in digging into any of our updates, let me know and we can set up a call. I'm still holding out hope that we can revisit the LMS conversation, as I saw a great fit for Absorb at Language & Culture, so please feel free to share any updates on your end as well with respect to revisiting the LMS project. 
 
Best Regards,
 
 
Brad Koster
Account Executive
1.587.400.6843
brad.koster@absorblms.com
www.absorblms.com

The Creativity Conference
Superstars lead Super Sessions.
Watch rockstar creatives demonstrate the workflows and techniques they use in their amazing work. Get valuable tips and tricks for how to level up your workflows using the latest product innovations. Choose from these four sessions or attend them all.
Space is limited — register now and save US$400 with promo code M24E. Pay just $1,595.*
Register now
Graphic Design
Discover incredible techniques from top graphic artists Jesús Ramirez and Magdiel Lopez to fuel your creativity, streamline your design workflows, and deliver stunning work.
Motion Design for Graphic Designers
Michelle Higa Fox and Paola Chen Li from design studio BUCK will show you how to leverage your skills in Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator to become adept in motion design tools like Adobe After Effects.
Video and AI
Join Brian Sanford and Justin Barnes from Versus to see how generative AI is revolutionizing video creation by automating tedious tasks and helping creators craft more captivating content.
Human-Centered AI Strategies for Creative Leaders
Join Heather Freeland, Chief Brand Officer at Adobe, for a fireside chat with creative leaders about ethical content creation with AI. You’ll learn how major brands are building strategies rooted in people and powered by AI.

subject: Sneak Peek: From Day One 2025 Conference Schedule
body:
We're excited to announce our 2025 event series with over 20 single-day live events in cities nationwide and 12 virtual events convening executives and decision-makers from across HR.
Our  invitation-only conferences will feature panels, keynotes, workshops and networking sessions presented by our community of partners on topics including rewards / recognition, innovation in benefits, talent acquisition, AI in HR, DEI, employee engagement, and employee learning and upskilling.
Even as we look ahead to 2025, this year still has a number of From Day One conferences remaining. We will be in 
Boston
 on September 12th, 
Philadelphia
 on September 24th, 
Denver
 on October 1st,
 
Los Angeles
 on October 9th, 
Austin
 on October 24th, 
Brooklyn
 on October 30th, and 
Miami
 on November 19th. From Day One also holds virtual events and webinars every week; find the schedule of upcoming events at 
fromdayone.co
.
To learn more about our 2025 events series, submit your interest in joining us as a speaking sponsor or exhibitor, or just say hello, reply to this email and I'll put you in touch with a member of our team, 
Best,
Nick Baily
Founder, CEO
From Day One
2025 LIVE EVENTS
Single Day Conferences: The New Era of Investing in Humans
In the face of increasing pressure for productivity, how can companies grow while building a culture based on trust and values? Employers will need to take a greater stake in the future of their employees. In our conference of HR leaders and colleagues, we’ll explore breakthroughs in thinking about how to make work fulfilling, create a sense of community, help employees increase their skills and performance, and produce better managers. You’ll discover the most innovative approaches in such fields as talent acquisition, total rewards, benefits, learning and development, employee engagement, AI and HR technology, and inclusion and belonging. 
Confirmed single-day conferences for 2025 include: 
- Atlanta (Jan 28, 2025)
- Washington DC (Feb 4, 2025)
- Houston (Feb 11, 2025)
- Salt Lake City (Feb 25, 2025)
- Silicon Valley (Mar 6, 2025)
- Seattle (Mar 25, 2025)
- Minneapolis (May 13, 2025)
- San Francisco (Sept 16, 2025)

2025 VIRTUAL CONFERENCES
January 22 - Benefits & Total Rewards
Innovation in Total Rewards: How Creative Leaders Are Finding Affordable Solutions
February 19 - Talent Acquisition
Making Talent Acquisition a Strategic Part of Workforce Planning and Growth
March 12 - Employee Engagement
Putting Employee Experience at the Center of HR Leadership

Better Benefits: Supporting the Health and Well-Being of Workers and Their Families

The Role of HR Leaders in Building a Culture of Recognition and Feedback
June 11 - Inclusion & Belonging
Charting the Future of Diversity, Equity, Inclusion and Belonging

Navigating the New Landscape of Employee-Benefit Solutions

December 10 - Future of Work

subject: D2L Update: August Edition
body:
To view this email as a web page, 
click here
 
Hi Kelly, 
Welcome to the D2L Customer Success Monthly Newsletter for 
August 2024
! 
Events and Webinars
D2L Fusion 2024: Transforming the Way the World Learns  
It's been a couple of weeks since Fusion 2024, and we're still buzzing with excitement. Our biggest event of the year was packed with inspiring keynotes, engaging discussions, and revolutionary product launches.
Check out our recent post 
Fusion blog
 post where you can relive the biggest moments from Fusion 2024.
 
 
What's New for August 20.24.08
August 20th 11-12pm EST Virtual
Want to stay on top of the latest and greatest in Brightspace being released this month? 
This session
 will cover all the newest release information in August 2024! 
 
 
D2L Expands Course Creation Product Suite
 
ICYMI: Last month we announced the acquisition of H5P Group, the leading EdTech provider of interactive content creation software with a global user base across more than 50 countries and serving millions of individuals. Learn more about H5P 
here
.
Other Events Taking Place in the Brightspace Community
Release Note Highlights
 
Highlights from the month’s release: 
 
 
 
Creator+
Creator+ Practices are now data-enabled 
 
 
 
Grades
 
Automatic zero for missing submissions
 
 
 
Learning Outcomes
Enhance reporting with the Achievement+ package 
Visit the Brightspace Community for the full list of 
Release Notes
 from July and view the updates that will be coming to your instance in August. For a look at our long-term plans, check out the 
Product Roadmap
 to see what is on the horizon and keep an eye on the 
high-impact changes timeline
 for upcoming changes to default Brightspace behaviour.
Success Stories
 
Achieving Inclusive Excellence
At 
Southern Illinois University Carbondale
, the Center for Teaching Excellence (CTE) embarked on a quest to achieve inclusive excellence by transforming their international TA (ITA) onboarding process with the use of Virtual Classroom and Video Assignments (Virtual Classroom) and D2L. By striving to address a need for accessible, on-demand training and interview-prepping process for international teacher assistants before their arrival on campus, CTE leveraged D2L tools and features like Virtual Classroom to help revise their approach. Reimagining ITA onboarding through empathy, equity, and innovation, CTE was able to help reduce stress levels for all stakeholders involved, increase brand identification and inclusivity, and improve operational efficiency by 80%. 
Read the Story
If you would like to be featured in a future success story, please reach out to your CSM or reply to this email. 
Community Corner
 
Creating Community with You  
This year we've released a new search tool, a new ASC support portal, and reorganized some large sections of documentation. Connect back to let us know how we're doing and what you'd like to see next in the Brightspace Community. 
This satisfaction survey
 is designed to be quick and easy to complete but your voice and ideas will make a big impact on the year to come. 
D2L CBE Client Connection
The goal of 
this group
 is to connect clients who have existing CBE programs or want to develop CBE programs at their institutions for resource sharing, idea sharing, and support.
Don't Miss
 
D2L Lumi Product Tour
August 22nd 3-4pm ET
D2L Lumi is where AI meets education. 
Join us
 for an exclusive webinar to see this powerful new suite of AI tools in action. You’ll see firsthand how D2L Lumi enhances, rather than replaces, the human touch in education.
Achievement Plus Product Tour “Outcome-Based Education Made Easy with D2L Achievement +”
September 10th 3-4pm ET
Join our live demo
 and see how easy outcome-based education can be. Our D2L experts will show you how to effortlessly manage learning outcomes across your courses, program and institution.

 /

/ 
D2L Champions Program
 
Krista Crockett
Customer Success

Follow Us

subject: 9 Minute Video: AI Impacts
body:
TO: Learning, Training & Business Colleagues
FROM: Elliott Masie, Chair
DATE: August 7, 2024
RE: AI Impacts on Workplace Learning – 9 Minute Video 
Elliott Masie has just recorded a 9-minute video update for colleagues on AI Impacts on Workplace Learning. As AI evolves each month, our organizations need to strategize its impacts on employee development and learning:
Click here for video: 
AI Impacts on Workplace Learning
In the video, we address: 
Beyond the Intro & Fascination Stage of AI
Preparing for Changing Job Roles that Use AI
Roles for Smart Tutors & AI Blended Learning
Integrating AI into Learning and Talent Systems
Big Learning Data and Predictive Data
Governance, Standards and Strategies for AI
We would be honored to have you participate in our next AI & Learning Event in Saratoga Springs, NY, to be held on September 10th and 11th. 
Information at 
https://www.masie.com
.
Yours in Learning,
Elliott Masie
Chair, MASIE Learning Foundation
CEO, MASIE Productions
https://www.masie.com 
emasie@masie.com

subject: Your Guide to HR Webinars for Summer and Beyond
body:
kelly
 
– 
We’ll be looking at the latest trends and topics in total rewards, benefits, talent acquisition, employee engagement, and more. Join us this summer and beyond for an informative slate of webinars with From Day One. Registration is free with the links below.
 
How to Use Skills Data to Power Development and Achieve Business Objectives
Tuesday, August 6, 2:00-3:00 pm ET
Eligible for 1 credit from SHRM and HRCI
The skills required for success are constantly evolving and organizations are struggling to adapt without clear visibility of the strengths and skills gaps in their workforce. This uncertainty leaves talent management and employee development journeys to guesswork, resulting in lost opportunities and strategic missteps. Organizations that utilize data about their talent's skills, or catalog and organize the skills workers currently possess, as well as identify the skills needed for future roles, are actively preparing their workforce to tackle new challenges as they arise. In this session, leaders will discuss how talent skills data can transform your approach to talent management, offer steps to start your journey and get ahead of the curve, and uncover how skills data can be used to facilitate and drive organizational goals. 
Register here
Becoming a HR Strategic Partner in Your Global Business Annual Planning
Thursday, August 8, 2:00-3:00 pm ET
Eligible for 1 credit from SHRM and HRCI
Workforce planning is most effective when teams align with their company's overall business objectives. Yet in reality, 75% of teams struggle to accurately forecast their hiring needs because they fail to get in sync with the overall company's direction. Join us to explore how to elevate your role as an HR leader in the annual planning process on a global scale. Learn how to connect with business goals and foster cross-regional collaboration, as well as discover techniques to position yourself as an indispensable partner in driving organizational success with C-level executives.
Register here
Crafting an Inclusive Financial Wellness Program to Engage and Empower Employees
Tuesday, August 13, 2:00-3:00 pm ET
Eligible for 1 credit from SHRM and HRCI
Financial wellness programs have become essential for attracting and retaining top talent while fostering an inclusive and engaged workforce. Experts from Addition Wealth, a holistic financial-wellness platform, will shed light on how to leverage financial wellness programs as an integral component of an inclusive benefits strategy, empowering employees to make smart, informed financial decisions. Join us to learn how to design a financial wellness program that effectively addresses the diverse needs and expectations of employees by combining digital tools with human expertise. 
Register here
Beyond Birth: How Employers Can Invest in the Postpartum Period
Tuesday, August 27, 2:00-3:00 pm ET
Eligible for 1 credit from SHRM and HRCI
More and more organizations are realizing that providing fertility benefits is essential for employees who are looking to conceive and start their family building journey. However, a key time period may be getting overlooked in the process - postpartum. How are organizations supporting employees after they give birth and return to work? What strategies and programs are out there that offer guidance and proactive outreach to those employees going through this unique time of their lives that don't break the bank?
Register here
Full-Cycle Recruiting: How to Hire Top Talent with a Holistic Approach
Tuesday, September 10, 2:00-3:00 pm ET
Eligible for 1 credit from SHRM and HRCI
Successful talent acquisition calls for technology, processes, and people working together to form a streamlined, end-to-end recruiting machine. That’s where full-cycle recruiting comes in. Hiring teams are far more efficient when they take a coordinated, standardized approach to all the steps in the hiring function. A full-cycle recruiting strategy that involves talent acquisition, human resources, interview panelists, and executive decision makers enables organizations to boost their candidate conversion rates and outcompete other employers for top talent. Join this webinar with Lever by Employ to learn how you can adopt this approach and become a full-cycle recruiting expert. Find out how to build a scalable, full-cycle process and learn actionable steps you can take to optimize your talent acquisition function.
Register here
Support the Change: Why Menopause Should Be Part of Your Women’s Health Strategy
Tuesday, September 17, 2:00-3:00 pm ET
Eligible for 1 credit from SHRM and HRCI
Offering solutions to improve and support needs specific to women can also be an important factor to retention. But a new survey reports that only 1% of US women have menopause support as part of their employee sponsored benefits. What’s more, according to a new survey, 85% of women said they don’t know enough about menopause, and 83% experiencing menopause report that their symptoms impact their ability to work.  Join us for this webinar to learn how employers can better support women experiencing The Change, and the impact it can have on productivity, medical spend and retention.
Register here
Addressing Chronic Insomnia to Enhance Employee Health and Productivity
Thursday, September 19, 2:00-3:00 pm ET
Eligible for 1 credit from SHRM and HRCI
Chronic insomnia is not just a nightly nuisance; it profoundly impacts overall health, leading to increased stress, impaired cognitive function, and higher risks of chronic conditions. The ripple effect extends to the workplace, where insomnia contributes to reduced productivity, increased absenteeism, and heightened healthcare costs. In this webinar, you'll hear real-world success stories and data-driven outcomes about Nox Health’s recently acquired digital therapeutic for insomnia. Learn how this cutting-edge solution empowers employees to achieve lasting improvements in their sleep patterns, enhancing their quality of life and performance at work.
Register here
Warmly,
Lauren Bello
Audience Marketing Assistant
From Day One

subject: Improving Workforce Effectiveness | Virtual Conference Invite
body:
Hi kelly – it’s Erin, co-founder of From Day One. I’d like to personally invite you to our virtual conference, 
Modernizing Your Workplace for a More Flexible, Inclusive Era
, happening October 16th. 
During this half-day event you’ll join top people leaders from companies including 7-Eleven and Pfizer, for insightful panel discussions, fireside chats, and breakout sessions. You’ll hear from experts who have created actionable plans to keep their workplaces functional and effective during the switch to hybrid and remote work. They’ll discuss how to evaluate workforce productivity while managing employee well-being.  
I have set aside a limited number of complimentary passes for this SHRM/HRCI-eligible conference, which you can

body:

View in Web Browser
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
August 29, 2024 — 9:00 am to 3:00 pm CST
Transform your efforts and invest your time and resources into initiatives that deliver the results you want. ROI Boot Camp, a virtual one-day workshop, will equip you with tools and strategies to showcase the impact and ROI of your investments in people, programs, and projects.
Here's What You Can Expect
Data-Driven Decision Making:
 Discover how measuring ROI can help you make informed decisions and allocate resources more effectively.
Evaluation Strategies:
 Learn about the five levels of evaluation and how they can provide valuable insights into the success of your programs.
The ROI Methodology:
 Gain a better understanding of how the ROI Methodology measures and validates the value of your initiatives, ensuring recognition and support.
Practical Applications and Calculations:
 See how to calculate the benefit-cost ratio and return on investment, empowering you to showcase the value of your projects.
Enroll in ROI Boot Camp for $297 and take the first step towards elevating your impact and ROI!
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
What Others Are Saying
"Attending ROI Boot Camp helped me to gain new skills, knowledge, and practical experience, which boosted my confidence and readiness to tackle the challenges of showing the impact of my programs."
 
"This one-day workshop was just what I needed—a condensed learning experience that offered an efficient way to learn how to calculate ROI without a long-term commitment."
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Do you have a colleague that would be interested in this session? Please share this information with them so they, too, can attend. Ask us about training options for your team.
 
 
 
 
 
 
Enroll in ROI Boot Camp

subject: Enroll in ROI Boot Camp and Elevate Your Impact
body:
‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌
 
 
View in Web Browser
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
August 29, 2024 — 9:00 am to 3:00 pm CST
Transform your efforts and invest your time and resources into initiatives that deliver the results you want. ROI Boot Camp, a virtual one-day workshop, will equip you with tools and strategies to showcase the impact and ROI of your investments in people, programs, and projects.
Here's What You Can Expect
Data-Driven Decision Making:
 Discover how measuring ROI can help you make informed decisions and allocate resources more effectively.
Evaluation Strategies:
 Learn about the five levels of evaluation and how they can provide valuable insights into the success of your programs.
The ROI Methodology:
 Gain a better understanding of how the ROI Methodology measures and validates the value of your initiatives, ensuring recognition and support.
Practical Applications and Calculations:
 See how to calculate the benefit-cost ratio and return on investment, empowering you to showcase the value of your projects.
Enroll in ROI Boot Camp for $297 and take the first step towards elevating your impact and ROI!
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
What Others Are Saying
"Attending ROI Boot Camp helped me to gain new skills, knowledge, and practical experience, which boosted my confidence and readiness to tackle the challenges of showing the impact of my programs."
 
"This one-day workshop was just what I needed—a condensed learning experience that offered an efficient way to learn how to calculate ROI without a long-term commitment."
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Do you have a colleague that would be interested in this session? Please share this information with them so they, too, can attend. Ask us about training options for your team.
 
 
 
 
 
 
Enroll in ROI Boot Camp 
 
 
 
 
 
Unsubscribe
 | Sent by ROI Institute 
2803 Greystone Commercial Blvd, Suite 16 • Birmingham, AL • 35242

subject: RE: Employee Engagement | Virtual Conference Invite
body:
Hi kelly - I noticed you haven’t reserved your complimentary ticket for next month’s virtual conference, 
Gaining Better Insight Into Worker Needs and Ambitions
.  
Join us on 
August 7th, from 12pm to 4:30pm ET to learn how to utilize AI to bring new employee insights without violating individual privacy. 
You can reply directly to this email, or feel free to 
use this exclusive link
 to receive your ticket. 
Looking forward to connecting with you! 
– Erin
On Tues, July 16, 2024 at 11:00 AM Erin Sauter wrote:
Hi kelly – it’s Erin, co-founder of From Day One. I’d like for you to join 400 of your HR and TA peers on Wednesday, August 7th for our virtual conference, 
Gaining Better Insight Into Worker Needs and Ambitions
. 
Top employers are using data to evaluate workforce engagement. During this half-day event you’ll learn how to utilize AI to bring new employee insights without violating individual privacy. I have set aside a limited number of complimentary passes for this SHRM/HRCI-eligible conference, which you can 
claim yours with this link
. 
Below my signature is a list of our announced speakers, but check out 
our event page
 for the latest details on this half-day program. Looking forward to it!
Warmly,
Erin Sauter

3 credits SHRM/HRCI

subject: Today: The Future of Benefits | Virtual Conference Invitation
body:
kelly
 – it’s Erin, co-founder of From Day One. I’m reaching out with a personal invitation to today's virtual conference, 
Innovative Benefits That Support Healthy Families and Caregivers
. 
You’ll hear from experts on how to incorporate cost-effective benefits to help caregivers, innovative methods to support employees with families, and those who care for disabled and elderly relatives. I know Language & Culture Worldwide is dedicated to providing cutting-edge support for their employees, so I thought this would be a great fit for you. 
Join us today, Wednesday, July 17 from 12 to 4:30 ET for this half-day virtual event. Plus, you’ll earn 3 credits from SHRM and HRCI. 
We have a limited number of complimentary passes for leaders like you, so 
register with this link. 
Hope you can join us! 
Erin Sauter 
Co-Founder, CRO 
From Day One
Confirmed speakers include:
Dhruv Vasishtha, CPO / Firsthand; Patient Ping
Mindy Fitzgerald, Global Director of Diversity Culture and Engagement / Air Products
Jessi Hempel, Senior Editor-at-Large / LinkedIn
Emily Oster, The Unexpected & CEO of ParentData / Author
Rachel Marling, Vice President, Total Rewards / New York Presbyterian Hospital 
Dionne Adams, Diversity and Inclusion / Pacific Gas and Electric Co. 
Brian Copeland, Senior Director, Total Rewards / Fannie Mae
